data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Jalisco.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Toluca.
In the minute 2, Play has been interrupted briefly in Guadalajara to check on Edgar Zaldivar, who is grimacing with pain.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 6, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Edgar Zaldivar is back on the pitch.
In the minute 8, Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
William da Silva of Toluca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 9, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Atlas a goal kick.
Atlas to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Atlas's Luciano Acosta misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, Toluca have a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Toluca throw-in in Atlas's half.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Edgar Zaldivar (Atlas) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Atlas drive into the zone and Luciano Acosta is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Atlas.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Atlas have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Alexis Canelo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Toluca have been awarded a penalty...
Toluca's Alexis Canelo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 23, It's advantage Toluca in Guadalajara as Alexis Canelo scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
Free kick Toluca.
Luis Garcia for Toluca has been booked by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre and receives a first yellow card.
Atlas have been given a penalty at Estadio Jalisco...
In the minute 28, Goal! The home team are now level through a Ignacio Malcorra penalty.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 33, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Atlas throw-in in Toluca's half.
Jesus Isijara hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Atlas!
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 35, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Toluca.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 37, At Estadio Jalisco, Alexis Canelo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Atlas have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Toluca.
Free kick in a good position for Atlas!
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Toluca to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Jalisco.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Jalisco.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 54, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
An attacking Toluca player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 57, Rubens Sambueza smashes in a penalty at Estadio Jalisco. The score is now 1-2.
Free kick Atlas.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Atlas throw-in in Toluca's half.
In the minute 59, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Toluca a goal kick.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Atlas to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
In the minute 66, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Atlas.
Atlas needs to be cautious. Toluca have an attacking throw-in.
Toluca's Alexis Canelo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 69, Alan Medina (Toluca) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 70, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Kevin Castaneda is on a sub for Alan Medina for Toluca.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Atlas make their first substitution with Brayan Trejo replacing Edgar Zaldivar.
In the minute 72, Toluca have a goal kick.
Enrique Triverio is replacing Michael Estrada for the away team.
Joao Plata is replacing Rubens Sambueza for Toluca at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 74, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Toluca.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Atlas.
In the minute 76, Atlas's Javier Correa breaks free at Estadio Jalisco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Jalisco.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Jonathan Herrera with Ignacio Jeraldino. This is the second substitution made today by Rafael Puente.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Toluca.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Jose Manuel De la Torre (Toluca) is making a fourth substitution, with Ivan Acero replacing William da Silva.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Alexis Canelo with Jonatan Maidana.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Throw-in Atlas.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Rafael Puente is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Edyairth Ortega replacing German Conti.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Luciano Acosta is booked for the home team.
In the minute 88, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Free kick Atlas.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Toluca.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Toluca have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Javier Guemez (Toluca) has received a yellow card from Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
